Title: Live Platform: A unique value-added services delivery platform | ODSP1470
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
AudioCodes Live Platform is a cloud-based service delivery platform that unites certified solutions for unified communications and contact centers, leveraging AI and cloud innovation to elevate user, agent, and customer experiences. With automated onboarding, seamless PSTN connectivity for Microsoft Teams, Webex Calling, and Zoom Phone, plus AI-powered voice apps, it enhances both employee (EX) and customer (CX) experiences.
